name: C2BII
overview:
C2bii (cashflow to bank and income impact) is the world’s first Financial Analysis application that can calculate a 100% accurate and verifiable answer to the most obvious (but until yesterday left unanswered) question, which is “Profit & Loss”.

It is based on a new, groundbreaking and proprietary methodology (with one US patent awarded, and a second Patent application pending in the US). It is the application that will define the third generation of Financial Analysis.

As a software application, it is a global first of its kind, as it is the only application currently on the global market that calculates 100% accuratelly the “Profit & Loss”. The reason that another application didn’t exist before it, is that the previously considered state-of-the-art methodology of NPV is so inaccurate that it is not fit as a base for software creation. If you try to find in wikipedia an article for “Investment Evaluation”, you will find that there is none. That is a first class clue to understand how inaccurate and problematic the previous state-of-the-art methodology in investment evaluation was.

C2bii is useful in investment evaluation scenarios, cashflow forecasts, working capital calculations, annual budgets, sensitivity analysis, product price policy scenarios, Bank loan terms evaluation, and most importantly general “What if” scenarios. It is currently in Version 1.0

milestones.description: The USPTO issued a "Notice of Allowance" on June 20 of 2011 on the second C2BII Patent Application. That one follows the already issued US Patent 7,668,768
